alert.note: Alert for Logan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Logan County through 400 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fleming, or 16 miles east of Sterling, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fleming, Iliff, Crook, Proctor, Twin Buttes and St Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
